byline.contributor: Ellen Barry contributed reporting from Mumbai, India.

abstract: Authorities in state of Gujarat, India, make decision to permanently confine male lion to zoo after forensic testing revealed it had eaten human remains; two other lions are under investigation in connection with puzzling string of deadly lion attacks on humans in state.

headline.print_headline: India Sentences Man-Eating Lion to Life — in the Zoo
headline.main: India Sentences Man-Eating Lion to Life — in the Zoo

snippet: Lion attacks on humans are rare, but in the first six months of this year there have been six killings in the western state of Gujarat.
lead_paragraph: Lion attacks on humans are rare, but in the first six months of this year there have been six killings in the western state of Gujarat.
